name: Discover scuba - Shore dive- 4 Reefs
small_description: Scuba underwater diving - explore the underwater maritime life, vibrant fish and awesome corals.
description:
Scuba diving is a mode of underwater diving where the diver can explore the underwater maritime life. One can see the amazing sea life among the world of awesome water bodies, vibrant fish and awesome corals.


The center is ais an Ecological Dive center focusing in marine environment protection, education & promotion. We are in to recreational scuba diving, PADI and SSI courses, ecological dive educations.
why_to_do:
• Havelock Island is the most popular location for scuba diving in Andaman .
  • this program is best in terms of time and experience.
  • This Program offers greater underwater time and also you get additional service .
  • The dive centre is located on the beach frontage with eco cottages.
  • Multi activity options such as snorkelling , Kayak,Peddle Boat , swim at the same location
  • Coffee shop
  • Swimming Pool
facilities:
• Personal Instructor
• Guides, escorts, safety demonstration
• Mineral water
physical_requirements: one with  problem related to ear and lung should report condition for fitness
medical_requirements: should not be using any medicine above 5 mg expect for thyroid
what_to_carry:
• A towel 
• A change of clothes 
• Swimwear or t-shirt & shorts 
• A USB driver or your smartphone where you can receive your pictures and videos
• Some snacks or fruits as you might feel hungry after diving
advisory:
- Light break fast is recommended before dive

- Post dive flight travel should be avoid for 24 to 48 hrs
confirmation_policy: Booking confirmations in 24 hours or Full Refund
cancellation_policy: Rs 200 plus 18% Gst for cancellation within 24
refund_policy: Before participating in a scuba diving course you will need to answer a medical statement. If you have any pre-diagnosed medical problem, it’s advised to visit your doctor prior to arrival, as this service is not available on Havelock

related_addons.name: Glass Bottom Boat at North bay
related_addons.description:
Glass boat boat are a special boat with a transparent bottom to view under water life seated around the glass surface.


North bay is a spot with coral reef close to shore lines and there Glass bottom boat ride are a very good means to enjoy the beautiful view of the reef seated comfortable in the dry and cozy deck  with in  the boat.
related_addons.small_description: Glass Bottom Boat at North bay - 30 min reef ride
related_addons.why_to_do:
It’s a easy way to enjoy the reef with out getting into waters .


You have better chance to spot marine life with wide view


better photo oppurtunity.
related_addons.facilities:
. Safety Jackets
. Assistance to board and alight from the boat

related_addons.name: High Speed Glass Bottom Boat at North bay
related_addons.description:
Spacious, luxurious and stylish glass bottom sightseeing commercial hydrofoil boat that offers best in class upscale passenger experience.


The Boat Glides on the sea further enhancing your comfort. Thus the dual advantage of speedboat ride as well as exploring the vibrant marine ecosystem comes under the same package




Spacious, luxurious and stylish glass bottom sightseeing commercial hydrofoil boat that offers best in class upscale passenger experience.


The Boat Glides on the sea further enhancing your comfort. Thus the dual advantage of speedboat ride as well as exploring the vibrant marine ecosystem comes under the same package



Every visiting traveller desire to


explore and experience the rich


marine underlife at andaman islands.




Can we do something about the way we


explore underwater without compromising


comfort and nature.




With conscious design to make under


water view most comforting and


enjoyable the special view glass with


a range uto 9 mtrs is ur big eye to the


underwater world.






Manufactured in RUSSIA and is Built


for voyages in coastal waters, large


bays under wind force 6 and 2 mtrs


wave condtions




with 30 passenger capacity High Speed Glass Bottom


Boat - A unique recreational with on board rest room and cozy seats around view area.






Constructed as per highest European


standards and has CE marking


complying with all safety




Dolphin will take tourist on daily ride from


north bay  to show rich coral and marine


life at specific spots at north bay


you can book boat ticket for ross and north bay from the following link.


https://ferrybooking.in/book/boat-booking.html
related_addons.small_description: High Speed Glass Bottom Boat - 30 min ride
related_addons.why_to_do:
This most Comfortable and cosy way to experience underwater world from the dry cabin with a huge glass bottom of the high speed boat


the boat ride is exhilarating as it reaches higher speed designed to glide above water
related_addons.facilities:
Snacks and beverages
certified and trained staff
onboard wash room and shower
related_addons.advisory:
must book your onward and return ticket of boat to reach north bay.

do not litter in the north bay as it a plastic free zone and will be fined for the same.
related_addons.confirmation_policy:
instant confirmation

The Slot timings are subject to Change without any prior notice based upon payload and weather conditions.

for cancellation by customer after deducting charges the final amount will refunded into as per original payment mode.

for cancelation by service provider due to non  confirmation of schedule full refund after deduction of service charges of 236 will be refunded.

related_addons.name: Bella bay - Dinner Cruise
related_addons.description: TSG BELLA Bay is a luxury dinner cruise created for guests to enjoy delectable food, breath-taking views of the islands and most importantly, to lay back and relax. We cruise around the Harbour area and pass through various places of interest such as Viper Island, Dundas point, Haddo, Chattam, Bambooflat, Mount Harriet, North Bay, Ross Island and Marina Water sports complex. She departs from the Junglighat Jetty every evening.
related_addons.small_description: Bella bay - Dinner Cruise
related_addons.why_to_do:
unique experience of dining on the high sea

chance to unwind on the upper deck under the star studded sky 

and view the beautiful lit up city scape.

name: Discover scuba shore dive - 3 Reefs
small_description: Discover scuba shore dive - 3 Reefs
description:
Scuba diving is a mode of underwater diving where the diver can explore the underwater maritime life. One can see the amazing sea life among the world of awesome water bodies, vibrant fish and awesome corals.

The center is ais an Ecological Dive center focusing in marine environment protection, education & promotion. We are in to recreational scuba diving, PADI and SSI courses, ecological dive educations.
why_to_do:
• Havelock Island is the most popular location for scuba diving in Andaman .
  • this program is smart choice as its a value for money.
  • This Program offer good underwater time and also price is less compared to more expensive options.
  • The dive centre is located on the beach frontage with eco cottages.
  • Multi activity options such as snorkelling , Kayak,Peddle Boat , swim at the same location
  • Coffee shop
  • Swimming Pool
facilities:
• Personal Instructor
• Guides, escorts, safety demonstration
• Mineral water
physical_requirements: one with  problem related to ear and lung should report condition for fitness
medical_requirements: should not be using any medicine above 5 mg expect for thyroid
what_to_carry:
• A towel 
• A change of clothes 
• Swimwear or t-shirt & shorts 
• A USB driver or your smartphone where you can receive your pictures and videos
• Some snacks or fruits as you might feel hungry after diving
advisory:
- Light break fast is recommended before dive

- Post dive flight travel should be avoid for 24 to 48 hrs
confirmation_policy: Booking confirmations in 24 hours or Full Refund
cancellation_policy: Rs 200 plus 18% Gst for cancellation within 24
refund_policy: Before participating in a scuba diving course you will need to answer a medical statement. If you have any pre-diagnosed medical problem, it’s advised to visit your doctor prior to arrival, as this service is not available on Havelock

related_activities.name: High Speed Glass Bottom Boat at North bay
related_activities.description:
Spacious, luxurious and stylish glass bottom sightseeing commercial hydrofoil boat that offers best in class upscale passenger experience.


The Boat Glides on the sea further enhancing your comfort. Thus the dual advantage of speedboat ride as well as exploring the vibrant marine ecosystem comes under the same package




Spacious, luxurious and stylish glass bottom sightseeing commercial hydrofoil boat that offers best in class upscale passenger experience.


The Boat Glides on the sea further enhancing your comfort. Thus the dual advantage of speedboat ride as well as exploring the vibrant marine ecosystem comes under the same package



Every visiting traveller desire to


explore and experience the rich


marine underlife at andaman islands.




Can we do something about the way we


explore underwater without compromising


comfort and nature.




With conscious design to make under


water view most comforting and


enjoyable the special view glass with


a range uto 9 mtrs is ur big eye to the


underwater world.






Manufactured in RUSSIA and is Built


for voyages in coastal waters, large


bays under wind force 6 and 2 mtrs


wave condtions




with 30 passenger capacity High Speed Glass Bottom


Boat - A unique recreational with on board rest room and cozy seats around view area.






Constructed as per highest European


standards and has CE marking


complying with all safety




Dolphin will take tourist on daily ride from


north bay  to show rich coral and marine


life at specific spots at north bay


you can book boat ticket for ross and north bay from the following link.


https://ferrybooking.in/book/boat-booking.html
related_activities.small_description: High Speed Glass Bottom Boat - 30 min ride
related_activities.why_to_do:
This most Comfortable and cosy way to experience underwater world from the dry cabin with a huge glass bottom of the high speed boat


the boat ride is exhilarating as it reaches higher speed designed to glide above water

Snacks and beverages
certified and trained staff
onboard wash room and shower
related_activities.what_to_carry:
skin care 
sun glass
related_activities.advisory:
must book your onward and return ticket of boat to reach north bay.

do not litter in the north bay as it a plastic free zone and will be fined for the same.
